name: Merrell Moab Speed Mid Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Women's
categories: Moab Speed Mid Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes
description:
Moving with speed is the name of the game. This eco-conscious trail shoe takes some inspiration from Merrell trail running shoes, for a fast and light ride that stands up to days in the backcountry. The thick midsole and mid-height collar provide support on uneven terrain and when carrying moderate loads, and the lugged outsole keeps you upright as you tackle the trail.Lightweight mesh upper with abrasion-resistant TPU overlays.GORE-TEX® membrane keeps water out.Breathable recycled mesh lining keeps feet cool.Laces are 100% recycled.Bellows tongue prevents trail debris from getting in.FloatPro® EVA midsole provides plenty of cushion and a rock plate protects against penetration.Vibram® EcoDura rubber outsole contains 30% recycled content.4mm lugs grip loose dirt and rock.

        Sustainability
